settings.title: THE NEW CLEAN
settings.content: Unwash challenges conventional wisdom and the harsh cycle of traditional shampoo, condition, repeat.

settings.title: Curls Dry Cleanser
settings.content:
No annoying white residue. 
Yes to shinier, bouncier hair. 
Yes to feeling like this is a waterless cleanser that's made just for your and your curls. 

We promise, there's nothing dry about this dry cleanser.

settings.title: in with the New Clean.
settings.content: Unwash is all about minimizing exposure to soap and locking in moisture, color, natural oils, and all the things that make hair smooth, shiny, healthy, frizz-free, and gorgeous.
